lead_paragraph: After months of flailing attempts, Donald J. Trump has begun to recast his message in more structured terms and wrestle with his temptation to go off script.

byline.original: By PATRICK HEALY and ALEXANDER BURNS

headline.print_headline: Trump’s Goal: Stay on Script About Clinton
headline.main: A Conflicted Donald Trump Tries a New Tactic: Sticking to the Script

snippet: After months of flailing attempts, Donald J. Trump has begun to recast his message in more structured terms and wrestle with his temptation to go off script....
abstract: Donald Trump has been working hard to restructure his political message as his presidential campaign struggles to revive its fading chances; to that end, Trump appears to embrace possibility that some illegal immigrants may be allowed to stay in country if they satisfy series of requirements, softening of hard-line immigration stance that helped him win Republican primary.
